umjikelezo wokufundisa: Izinyathelo ezilandelwa yi-CPU ukuze isebenzise umyalo owodwa
superscalar architecture: Idizayini ye-CPU engasebenzisa imiyalo eminingi ngomjikelezo wewashi ngamunye
isibikezelo segatsha: Isu lapho i-CPU izama ukuqagela ukuthi okunemibandela kuzoya ngaphi
northbridge: I-chipset (amasistimu amadala) axhume i-CPU ku-RAM namabhasi anesivinini esikhulu
southbridge: I-Chipset (amasistimu amadala) abephethe amapheripheral ahamba kancane kanye ne-I/O
i-hyperthreading: Ubuchwepheshe obuvumela umongo we-CPU owodwa ukuthi uvele njengamakhora anengqondo amaningi
risc: Eyehlisiwe I-Instruction Set Computer - idizayini ye-CPU enemiyalo elula
cisc: I-Complex Instruction Set Computer - idizayini ye-CPU enemiyalo enamandla, eyinkimbinkimbi
simd: I-Single Instruction Multiple Data, indlela yokucubungula idatha ngokuhambisana
microarchitecture: Imininingwane ethile yokusebenzisa yesethi yemiyalo ye-CPU
uhlelo ku-chip: Ukuhlanganisa izingxenye eziningi (CPU, GPU, njll.) ku-chip eyodwa
uhlelo olushumekiwe: Isistimu yekhompyutha enikelwe emsebenzini othile, ngokuvamile ngaphakathi kwedivayisi enkulu
overclocking: Isebenzisa i-CPU ngesivinini esiphezulu kunokucaciswa kwayo okuhlosiwe
ukwenziwa ngaphandle kwe-oda: Isu lapho i-CPU yenza imiyalelo ngendlela esebenza kahle kakhulu
i-neuromorphic computing: Izakhiwo zekhompuyutha eziphefumulelwe ingqondo ezidizayinelwe imisebenzi ye-AI
